title: Orzo with Salmon, Green Beans and Avocado Sauce

ingredients.content: 3 ½ oz fresh green beans, trimmed, halved
3 oz fennel bulb, trimmed and thinly sliced (approx. 1 sm.)
5 oz red onion, halved, thinly sliced

preparations.content: Place Varoma into position and weigh in salmon, season with lemon juice, ½ tsp salt, pepper and dill. Insert Varoma tray, weigh in green beans and fennel. Remove Varoma and set aside.

Place water and 1 tsp salt into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma and set aside. Add pasta into mixing bowl and cook for <b>time indicated on package/212°F//speed <b>. Drain pasta and allow to cool.

Place avocado, yogurt, lemon juice, mustard, dill and salt into mixing bowl and blend <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and blend a further <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Mix pasta with reserved green beans and fennel, onions and reserved avocado sauce. Flake steamed salmon with a fork, discard skin and fold into pasta. Serve warm or cold.
